product_name: MACConnect In Colour Eyeshadow Palette Unfiltered Nudes
summary: SummaryMAC Connect In Color Eyeshadow Palette Unfiltered Nudes is a true-nude 12-pan eyeshadow palette with pigment packed color in one-swipe for limitless minimal to maximal looks. MAC eyeshadow allows for an effortless application, buildability and blendability as you customize your eyes your way
details: DetailsBenefitsTrue nudes: dimensionalizedPigment Packed Colour in One-SwipeLightweight, silky-smooth eyeshadow textureEven and seamless blendabilityWet to intensify for all-day wear, 8 hoursWet to intensify for crease-resistant, smudge-proof colourSafe for contact lens wearersOphthalmologist-testedFormulated with up to 25% higher pigment load vs previous MAC Eye Shadow palettesFeaturesTrue nude eyeshadow paletteAn eyeshadow palette lineup of neutrals and essentials in a range of matte, shimmer, glitter and metallic finishesA first-of-its-kind eyeshadow formula reviews.headline: Great neutral palette!
reviews.comments: After my TooFaced Natural Eyes palette was discontinued, I needed another neutral nude palette than leans cool for daily wear and that will be suitable for work travel and a professional setting. This one is perfect. I usually use eye shadow primer but even without primer these shades do not fade or crease much. Works great for my green hazel eyes. Sturdy palette too. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: I would have buy it but
reviews.comments: Is not single refillable.. Been waiting for an eye mac pallette but i thought it was going to be refilllabale

reviews.headline: Why is the mirror fogged over?
reviews.comments: Why is the mirror fogged out on this product: MAC Connect In Colour Unfiltered Nudes Palette

reviews.headline: My favorite "luxury" eyeshadow
reviews.comments: As an eye makeup junkie, I've honestly never really felt impressed by any luxury/designer EYESHADOW brands I've spring for (this review doesn't apply to eyeliners or mascara), and was always happier overall with the performance and value of drug store brands like L'Oreal, CoverGirl, Physician's Formula, and NYX. Higher end-wise, I've invested in brands like Pat McGrath, Urban Decay, Nars, and now MAC. Pat McGrath is lovely, but honestly, I just found the pricing unreasonable for the amount of product you get. This MAC palette is really beautiful, great application and staying power, and a really fair price for the amount of product, performance, and the name (let's face it - we are paying more for a "high end" name). If I decide to splurge a bit on eyeshadow, MAC will be the brand I do it with from now on. Would recommend.

reviews.headline: Great everyday pallet.
reviews.comments: I almost return this pallet cause the colors story was kind of bkand. I am so glad that I didn't. I have a lot of pallets but this has been my go to work pallet. It's great for every day and the office. The shadows blend well and stay through out the day.

reviews.headline: Easy to work with, great quality
reviews.comments: I have all but one Connect in Colour Palettes. The color stories are nice, the shadows show up true to pan (on me), the formula is easy to work with. I love every look I've done with these Connect in Colour Palettes. I do recommend them, especially if you want Pat McGrath Mothership Palette vibes. No, it's not a dupe, but it does have the same vibes.

reviews.headline: Its my everyday go to but not what i expected
reviews.comments: love the shades and the pigment! just wish the shimmer shadows were long wearing; they started fading away after 5 hours into my day and that's with using my painterly paint pot to prime.

reviews.headline: Nude Palette
reviews.comments: Nice shades! Blends great! Nice for traveling!

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I purchased this after seeing a YT influencer rave about this.  The colors are pretty, the formulas apply smoothly, I love the packaging and the large mirror.   I've now had a chance to wear several looks over the past few weeks.  Unfortunately, every combination of shadows resulted in severe creasing within a few hours, and muddying of the colors so that I could no longer tell that multiple colors were applied.  Sadly, this is going back.  I have drug store and budget friendly shadows like Colourpop that don't do this on me.

reviews.headline: Great for cool toned lovers
reviews.comments: The best part is how smoothly this applies. It has lots of pigment and with no fallout! I love the formula. From the images I was hoping these would lean more warmer/true chocolate brown tones. They do lean more cool/grey toned browns. If thats what your looking for i think you would enjoy this palette. They work great for a basic or very smoky look.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this again.
reviews.comments: This pallet is just what I was looking for. Lots to choose from to create the look that I like.

reviews.headline: Beautiful colors
reviews.comments: Great color pallet. Pigmentation is great.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: The perfect neutral palette. Great quality.

reviews.headline: Love the New Mac Eye Shadows
reviews.comments: I couldn't wait to give these new Mac eyeshadows a try and they definitely do NOT disappoint. they go on so nice and smooth, great pigment and they blend really nice! I have been on the hunt for a good neutral palette and Mac definitely does not diappoint with the selections of neutrals, great mix of mattes and shimmers!

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm a makeup enthusiast that is trying to be a more conscious consumer therefore I have been focused on getting high quality versatile basics and this MAC connect Hi-Fi color palette in Unfiltered Nudes did not dissapoint! The shadows in this palette are incredibly pigmented, go on silky smooth for crease free all-day wear even in humid climates. There is a mix of matte nude shades and shimmers that allow endless combinations for natural, glam and smoky looks. For my everyday routine I am more of a neutral matte gal but I found myself reaching for the incredibly beautiful shimmer and glitter shades. I found them to be very versatile during my vacation when I misplaced my brushes and was able to achieve a great look just by blending shades with my fingers dry and then wet for a more intense smoky eye. I would definitely recommend the MAC connect Hi-Fi color palette to my friends that want high quality nude shades that are perfect for any occasion and flatters many skin tones
faceoff_positive.headline: Must have versatile nude palette for simple to glam looks!

faceoff_negative.comments: The pallet is beautiful with an awesome weight and packaging is gorgeous. I love that it comes with a big mirror. Now when it comes to the eyeshadows itself the colors were beautiful. However, the formula is a bit sheer and I did have a bit of fallout. Because it was so sheer blending was a bit difficult and just made everything muddy. I was really hoping to love this product because I've never had anything MAC before but this wasn't the case. Hope to find something that will work for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Torn

rollup.name: Connect In Colour Eyeshadow Palette Unfiltered Nudes
